placeSubmitted.title: Submission Successful!
placeSubmitted.subtitle: Thank you for contributing to our neurodivergent-friendly community.
placeSubmitted.step1: Your submission is being reviewed by our AtipicALI team
placeSubmitted.step2: We'll verify the information and ensure it meets our community guidelines
placeSubmitted.step3: You'll receive a notification once your place is approved and published
placeSubmitted.timelineMessage: We aim to review and respond to all submissions within 48 hours.
placeSubmitted.questionsMessage: If you have any questions about your submission or need to make changes, feel free to reach out:
placeSubmitted.keepReceipt: Keep your receipt number for reference
